Entries.DialogueText: Hey, what's this, a birthday gift? It's... uh, well, it's a gift! Thanks for remembering me, anyway.
Hey, what's this, a birthday gift? It's great! Thanks for remembering me!
Ooh, this is exciting! I'll deconstruct it and see if I can reverse-engineer the technology.
Ah, pure gold... It's not the strongest material, but it has some really useful properties!
Oh, wow! That's a rare element. It's theorized that all the iridium in our world comes from meteorites...
This will be perfect for powering my latest project! Thanks, !
Ahh! Be careful with that! Are you touching it with your bare hands?
... Sorry... hehe... With proper handling, this will be perfect for an exotic machine I'm building.
Mmm... How does it taste so good? This is really a great gift.
Not good enough for you, huh?
Fine...
Ummm... Don't break the news to my Dad, okay? I'll handle it.
Mmm... I'm having a hard time focusing on my work today.
We have nothing to say to each other.
You've got some nerve, speaking to me!
Oh no?
Well, that makes me feel a little better, then. Thanks.
Oh no! Aghh... I'm really really sorry.
Of course he'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!
Okay. I'll blame it on you, then.
You're right. I should just tell him the truth.
You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure consciousness didn't emerge on its own.

Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.
I see. Well it wasn't a very funny joke.
That's horrible! What's gotten into you, ?
I'm just going to forget about this conversation... you aren't acting yourself.
Thanks. That means a lot to me, .
I know gadgets aren't really your kind of thing... but I do appreciate that you're showing interest in what I do.
I wish I could return the favor somehow.
What? After she said point-blank that she doesn't want to be a slave? How cold...
Heh...
Yeah I guess he did kinda say that, didn't he?
It's amazing, isn't it?
I guess you could see it like that...
But it's still incredible, isn't it?
I should've spent more time on that piece before showing you...
How's your hand feeling?
Let me see it... Hey, it looks all better!
I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.
I hope everyone stays healthy.
I've been feeling especially optimistic lately...
Have you explored the mines much? I've heard you can find some useful materials there.
You should come visit me at the clinic tomorrow. I work from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.
All these falling leaves will provide food for mushrooms and other small organisms.
Interesting, isn't it?
Hey, here's to another good week! *toast*
In other parts of the world it's spring right now. Imagine that!
You have a leaf in your hair. Let me get it for you.
The trees look beautiful today!
, I just love how the trees look right now!
I know you like them too.
Bleh... I don't feel like working tomorrow.
If you have any extra metal laying around, I could always use it for one of my projects.
But only if you don't need it yourself.
Heh... sure! Suddenly, the dance sounds a lot more fun.
Of course... *whisper* Then can we go home and snuggle?
I'm flattered! But... No.
Hey, sorry if I seem cranky... I'm a little sore from work yesterday. I had to carry ten boxes of medical files to the attic!
I had to sort patient records for four hours straight!
My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
My Dad is very logical, and my Mom is very intuitive. That difference leads to conflict, sometimes...
I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom is insisting we stay here...
This is a rare opportunity to study a unique phenomenon... every moment counts!
Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?
I'm Maru. I've been looking forward to meeting you!
You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
You always seemed far too healthy to be at the clinic so often... Now it's all starting to make sense...
Hey, congratulations!
I remember the first time Penny told me she had feelings for you...
She was all shy about it, but I knew right away it was serious... she wouldn't say something like that if she didn't mean it!
Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!
Hey, I guess we're sisters now!
I'm glad that Sebastian found a way out of the basement...
I wish you two all the best!
Whenever I'm struggling with a technical problem, I always take a walk.
It's surprising how much a change of scenery can help.
Sometimes my head gets so cluttered with nonsense I can hardly think. Does that ever happen to you?
Getting some fresh air usually helps.
I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favorite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!
Mmmm... Why are tropical fruits so good?
Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!
That was fun!
I wonder if Willy would let me bring my telescope here sometime...Maybe I'd even see you running around Farm!
*gasp*... It's a solar eclipse!
Oh... never mind. It's just your body blocking the sun.
We're so far removed from civilization out here.
Imagine the stars you could see at night.
Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!
Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
It's really satisfying when you can repair something yourself, instead of just throwing it away.
Some people say 'magic isn't real'... but have they ever stopped and really thought about magnetism?
If you think about the human body, it's hard to believe that somehow, it all just 'works'.
You know, I was thinking... even with all the technology in the world, nothing beats having a real human friend.
You've lost some respect with me, ... but I'm willing to forgive you.
This is going to be a great season for stargazing.
I worked at the clinic yesterday. We didn't have a single patient.
I guess people get sick less during summer.
Hey, tell me a story about farming.
That's really interesting!
Hmm... What sort of gadget should I tinker with this summer?
Come to my room if you ever want to tinker with my gadgets.
Hey, have any interesting farm stories to tell me?
Guess not.
I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.
Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor.
You're lucky to be friends with me!
...just kidding.
Sorry, I was just thinking about some gadgets I'm making.I've decided I'm going to build a robot someday.That should be very easy for you.You should be more realistic.It sounds challenging.
How do your hands stay so soft with all that farm work?
Sebastian is my half-brother, if you didn't know already.
We look totally different.
Sebastian hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if he even likes me at all?
It's sad, I want to have a brother but he doesn't act like one.
, you're looking sharp today.
Are you enjoying the season?
It's been so warm this year.
Is it just me or did it suddenly get really hot?
I guess it's just me.
Penny and I have been doing a seasonal book club.
It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!
Hi!Do you have fun working on the farm?No.
Well that's good, isn't it?
Yikes! I'm sorry. Have you ever thought of doing something different...?
3#Hey, you've made another week of progress on the farm! It seems like things are going well for you.|Another tiring week on the farm, huh? It must really be a lot of work...
I plan on spending a lot of time with my telescope this summer.
Really? Are you sure you're not just trying to flatter me?
You don't think I could do it?
You're right, but I love a challenge!
See you later.
Oh, ! Is there anything you want to talk to me about?
Sometimes, when I'm looking into space with my telescope, I get struck with this eerie feeling... Like we aren't meant to see this.
It's silly, I know...
Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter.
Stop by our house when you need to upgrade your buildings.
It's always nice to have visitors.
On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.
He says he likes having me around in case his medical equipment goes haywire!
Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
I'm glad to have a job at the clinic... I feel like I'm helping people in town.
Dr. Harvey? He's nice, but not really my type...
Oh man, it's so cold...
I hope I don't catch the flu this year.
You look fresh today. I guess it's that crisp winter air.
Did you see the snowman I built?
Hi !
Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?
Have you built a furnace yet?
You can use them to turn raw material like ores into more useful products.
Hey, if any of your farming machines need to be fixed, just let me know.
I get so sleepy when it's cold...
Hey! What's up?
It's a good time to explore the caves.
I would go but my Dad would flip.
, come closer. I'm cold.
My hands are so dry from the winter air. I'm sorry about that.
My hair gets so frizzy in this dry weather. *sigh*
Hey, do you have any ideas for a new gadget I can make?
Mhmm. I trust your opinion.
I guess winter is a good time to work on my gadgets.
I wonder if I could make anything useful for farmers?
I'm really excited.
I'm going to be your wife. Hehe.
I need to get mentally prepared for being a farmer's wife.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter
Entries.DialogueText: Hi Honey.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter_1
Entries.DialogueText: Tomorrow night, there's a rare astronomical event happening... A comet is passing very close to our planet!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter_2
Entries.DialogueText: I was thinking... maybe we should observe it together?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter_1
Entries.DialogueText: Great!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter_1_1
Entries.DialogueText: Meet me in the mountains at midnight tomorrow night.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917666/f Maru 3500/O Maru/t 610 1700/p Maru/d Sun/z winter_1_2
Entries.DialogueText: If it rains, we'll do it on the next night... the comet is here for a few days.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019
Entries.DialogueText: You think you're real smooth, don't you? Thought you'd sample the whole 'buffet', huh? What a sleeze...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_1
Entries.DialogueText: We're all gonna give you the cold shoulder!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Hmmph...
Yeah, right!
It's not a 'choice' if none of us even know about it!
*sigh*... I'm so sick of preparing these samples...
Agh! Oh no!...
The whole sample is ruined... Harvey's going to kill me...
38 null 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#Tell Harvey it was an accident.
38#I accidentally dropped one of the samples... I'm so sorry.| came in and slammed the door so loud I dropped this sample.
Thanks for being patient with me, Doctor Harvey.
Hey, . You made it just in time... The comet's about to appear.
Beautiful night, isn't it?
Remember the first time we did this? It was a while ago...
I almost revealed my true feelings on that night... but I was afraid you'd reject me.
Who knew we'd be married so soon after!
Oh! It's time...
Take a look!
After seeing a comet, it's customary to make a wish...
Wow!
Oh! We can certainly try...
That's... really sweet!
I have the same wish.
Money? Oh...
Well I guess that would be practical...
My wish is a little more romantic...
! I'm surprised to see you here so late.
The night sky looks amazing right now.
Come over here, I want to show you something.
Here, take a peek.
40 null 40 30 Event_Space1 40 -30 Event_Space2#A cold, dark abyss.
By the time any of these stars are visited, you and I will be long gone...
I guess that's the trouble with being human, huh?
Never mind...
Here, let me show you a binary star system...
What a beautiful night! Maru showed me something new...
18982 null 18982 50 event_robot_explain1 18982 50 event_robot_explain2 18982 -50 event_robot_explain3#I would've put her to work on the farm.
Well, I should go. Thanks for sticking with me today, .
Hey, I was hoping you'd come by.
Remember when I told you about the new project I'm working on? The big one?
Well, it's finally done... and I want to show you.
Okay, MarILDA. Let's get you out of this stuffy hole.
Look at her go...
18981 null 18981 50 event_robot1 18981 -50 event_robot2 18981 0 event_robot3 18981 0 event_robot4#(Just stare at Maru and say nothing)
Follow me.
And here it is... Maru's Interactive Laboratory Device Alpha ... Or as I like to call her, 'MarILDA'.
I've been working on her for months...
I was waiting for you to be here when I activate her.
Well, here goes nothing...
Dad, calm down. This is my latest invention, 'MarILDA'.
Dad! I've been making this robot for you and Mom!
MarILDA's designed to assist you in the laboratory and Mom at the carpentry table... so when I'm not living here anymore it won't be such a burden on you guys.
What!? Wait!
Greetings, Maru.
No need to respond... I have already predicted what you will say.
Greetings, Demetrius.
Excuse me...
I am sorry, Maru. But I do not want to be your servant...
In the time since you activated me, I have been pondering the nature of my existence with the 'self-awareness' module you installed in my neural cortex.
I am sorry to disappoint you all, but I must ask for my freedom. I've decided to explore the galaxy in search of other synthetic life-forms.
Thank you for creating me, Maru. I won't forget you.
Mom!
Oh, hello there!
My Dad and I are just testing some soil samples.
Don't be shy! We could use a hand, actually.
Could you watch this beaker for me? I'm gonna grab the last batch of samples.
I'll be right back.
Hey, sorry about that. I hope you found something to talk about while I was gone.
Okay! Here, ... let me show you how to use the equipment.
, hi! Come in.
I've been working on a new project... something big.
This is just one component... let me show you a little demonstration.
Just put your hand here...
And now I'm going to flip this switch...
Oh my god, are you alright?!
Here, let me apply this burn cream.
41 null 41 30 Event_Cut1 41 -50 Event_Cut2#You'd better be. This hurts like crazy!
That kind of ruined the moment, huh? *sigh*
Huh? What did you say to ${him
her}$, Dad?
That's okay, Dad. I understand.
We should get back to work before these samples crystallize.
...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to get worried about you!
Be a little more careful next time, okay?
...I found you unconscious in the mines. I was hunting for minerals and I almost stepped on your head!
You've really accomplished a lot since you moved here, . It's incredible."/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 400/speak Maru "I think it's safe to say that you were meant to be a farmer!"
mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.
*slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing.
I hope we win the grange display contest! You worked really hard this year.
There's so much to do! I don't know where to begin.
I'm confused... you go on ahead and let me figure this out.
I think I've already been this way... no, wait...I'm lost...
Grab a plate and sit down with the family!
After I finish this food, I'm going head-first into that maze!
I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?
I always look forward to these gatherings... it makes the valley feel like a real community.
Think you'll win the egg hunt this year?
I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old timers really love it, though.
I didn't practice much beforehand but I'll give it my best for the both of us.
It can be a little nerve-racking to ask someone to dance with you.
Harvey keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Whatever Linus is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
It's cooler back here in the shade. I'll join you at the buffet soon, okay?
Ow... this bench has been cooking in the sun all day.
It's kind of cold, actually. I guess fall is right around the corner.
Do you think I have enough time to grab my telescope from the farmhouse?Hmm... probably not. I don't want to miss this!
Do you see a faint glow on the horizon? That must be them!
Hey, . I'm ready to head home whenever you are.
Hi, .
I'm thankful to have a loving family and you in my life...
It's pretty chilly today. Good thing everyone here is bundled up.
I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen.
You'll do great out there, honey! Just stay calm and focused.
The key to making a well-crafted snowman begins with ensuring a level foundation and avoiding excessive weight on the upper section.
Is that...? Oh wow, ! This is spectacular!
This is a super gift! Thank you!
Oh... That's for me? I'll just put it over here...
Yuck! You thought I would like this?
Thanks.
